name: Late Summer Tales
description:
~ still in development ~
release date: 16.10.2020
There are bugs, content is missing, who checks for spelling mistakes, and they forgot to bring the music! Come back later to see the full experience

You and your friends from school enjoy their last evening in late summer together, before every one of you starts a new life. Say goodbye, make jokes about your time and find out the truth. Everyone knows you will leave but nobody wants to talk about it.

This game is very close to my heart. A lot of personal experiences are woven into this game.

Controls: you only need a mouse

Left Mouse Clickwalk / talkHolding Right Mouse Buttonrotate the camera
Middle Mouse Click / Enter / Escapepause game
